concept.title: Reuse: Technical content general
concept.shortdesc: This file contains elements used by multiple files in the DITA specification.

section.title: Task labels
section.p: Implementations might want to consider having their stylesheets render a label for this element.

section.title: Release domain reuse
section.p: The recommended best practice is to use date strings that conform to the ISO 8601 standard, unless a UNIX-style machine time stamp is used. The string might contain a date and time (for example, 2017-04-05T12:30-02:00) or just a date (for example, 2019-03-04).
